Dissection tools (scissors, forceps, spatulas, razor blades) should all be cleaned and autoclaved prior to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hjkj","text":"b. Prepare dishes or plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dntm","text":"    i. Have solutions warmed, equilibrating, and prepared prior to starting dissection (plating media, digestion solution, digestion inhibition solution).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29qht","text":"    i. Sterile filter digestion and inhibition solutions prior to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1v12","text":"d. status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f2vi6","text":"In laminar flow hood: have aluminum foil for mice, Kimwipes or paper towels for dissection, tools, ice bucket and Brain Bits Hibernate A (BB HA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"asikn","text":"Begin dissection.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3vfsb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"75vlj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"8a5nc","text":"Note: Steps may be done simultaneously on 6-8 pups or sequentially on each pup.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8pcaj","text":"Remove tools from alcohol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"enqe6","text":"Decapitate pup/s with scissors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ekh6","text":"Use razor to make a mid-sagittal incision only penetrating the skin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvprj","text":"Use razor to make a small mid-sagittal incision in the skull, then press down hard hemisecting the brain and skull. Push apart.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40vv6","text":"Dip blunt dissecting spatulas into the wash solution. Scoop out brain hemisphere, severing the olfactory bulb for ease.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ro2h","text":"Separate cortex from colliculi exposing the hippocampus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76ru0","text":"Identify the hippocampus by hallmark crescent shape, and medial, longitudinal blood vessel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dbe2","text":"Press down ventral of the hippocampus (in the crescent) with one spatula. Gently push onto this spatula with the other. The structure should cleanly slide free.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"audp7","text":"Place in chilled BB HA solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fe00c","text":"Keep   until ready to place hippocampi into warmed and sterile filtered digestion solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"115044F0E3E211ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ndd2","text":"Using 10 mL serological pipette, transfer hippocampi from BB HA to digestion solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9s1v","text":"Incubate in   water bath for   to  , with intermediate mixing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ldf6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"59DAD370E3E211ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"6283C680E3E211ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"65C7F500E3E211ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fpbgm","text":"During this time:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8tsij","text":"Ensure plates/dishes are ready.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eq69t","text":"Prepare trypan blue Eppendorf tube (  TB +   cells) to count.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4acs9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"54BBF180E3E211ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"56DB4F10E3E211ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ab0fs","text":"Following digestion incubation, gently remove hippocampi with 10 mL serological pipette and place into 15 mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6iuga","text":"Wash hippocampi. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ev5t0","text":"Then add final   to   inhibition solution and triturate hippocampi gently using fire polished pasteur pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7b9li","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"00719D90E3E311ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"052A43A0E3E311ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1kq86","text":"Once triturated, allow any undissociated tissue to sink to the bottom, gently transfer remaining suspension to fresh 15 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hjaa","text":"Pull   aliquot for counting, then centrifuge at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"65m13","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"22072E20E3E311ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":240,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"189B6040E3E311ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6kg40","text":"Wash hippocampi with inhibition solution   to  . (1/3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"75dt8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"E5155FA0E3E211ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"E7963E20E3E211ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tagj","text":"Wash hippocampi with inhibition solution   to  . (2/3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"EB30DC43E3E211EC80340A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"EB30DB44E3E211EC80340A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"84tkc","text":"Wash hippocampi with inhibition solution   to  . (3/3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"ED26C855E3E211EC80340A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"ED26C90BE3E211EC80340A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8dva","text":"Make up the   (1:4 dilution of cells) trypan blue mixture, load   to hemacytometer, and count 4 quadrants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"6A22CE30E3E311ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"61BC1440E3E311ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3rs75","text":"Calculate desired concentration of cells/mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8pj5c","text":"Dilute cells with appropriate amount of pre-equilibrated plating media to get desired cell concentration and then add to dishes/plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7945p","text":"Place these in incubator and incubate for   to  , or   before switching to growth medium (Brain Bits NbActiv4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10800,"guid":"9F615440E3E311ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"A1642920E3E311ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"A399F4E0E3E311ECA5D99FBD64DF14E7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}
